column2: "Dɛm ntsi
column3: mo nuanom adɔfo a mafe hom
column4: hom a hom yɛ me dɛw nye m’ahenkyɛw
column5: hom ngyina pintsinn dɛm wɔ Ewuradze mu

column2: "Mutu Euodia fo
column4: dɛ wɔnyɛ adwenkor wɔ Ewuradze mu."

column2: "Na meserɛ wo so
column4: boa mbaa dɛm yi a wɔnye me yɛɛ edwuma wɔ asɛmpa no mu no
column5: nye Klement so nye m’anyɛnkofo edwumayɛfo a hɔn dzin wɔ nkwa nwoma no mu no."

column2: "Hom ndzi dɛw wɔ Ewuradze mu daa! Misi do bio dɛ
"Hom mma nyimpa nyina nhu dɛ hom wɔ abodwekyɛr. Ewuradze abɛn."
"Mma hom nnyɛ dadwen wɔ biribiara ho
column3: na adze nyina mu hom mfa mpaabɔ nye nkotoserɛ nye ndaase mma hom ebisadze ndu Nyankopɔn enyim."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn n’asomdwee a ɔtra ntseasee nyina no
column3: ɔbɔweɔn hom akoma nye hom adwen wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."

column2: "Na nkaa no
column10: sɛ ɔbra pa bi wɔ hɔ a
column11: anaa ayɛyi bi so wɔ hɔ a
column12: hom ndwen dɛm ndzɛmba yi ho."

column2: "Dza hom suae
column5: na hom hunii wɔ mo mu no
column7: na asomdwee Nyankopɔn no nye hom bɛtsena."

column2: "Midzi dɛw kɛse so wɔ Ewuradze mu dɛ hom asan rodwendwen mo ho bio; ɔyɛ nokwar dɛ hom dwen mo ho dada
column3: na adagyer bi na hom ennya ammfa annkyerɛ."

column2: "Nnyɛ dɛ ohia ntsi na mereka dɛm
column4: mesua dɛ asetsena biara a mowɔ mu no
column5: mema mo bo dwe mo ho."

column2: "Ahokyer mu asetsena a
column4: na minyim ahonya so dze mu tsena. Mesua adze biara nye adze nyina ho kwan a mefa do gyina enyim

column2: "Mutum adze nyina yɛ wɔ nyia ɔhyɛ me dzen no mu."
"Naaso hom yɛɛ no yie dɛ hom bɔboaa me wɔ m’ahohia mu."
"Na hom Filipifo
column6: asɔr biara nye me enndzi nkitaho wɔ ɔma nye ɔgye ho dɛ hom nko;"

column2: "na Tesalonika mpo hom somaa prɛko na bio so ma bɔhwɛɛ me hia."
"Nnyɛ dɛ morohwehwɛ akyɛdze ntsi a
column3: na mbom morohwehwɛ aba a ɔbɔdɔɔ so ama hom nkontaabu."

column2: "Na menya adze nyina ma atra do: mayɛ ma
column3: osiandɛ me nsa kaa dza hom dze faa Epafroditus do monaa me no
column5: afɔrbɔ a wɔgye a ɔsɔ Nyankopɔn enyi papa bi."

column2: "Na me Nyankopɔn bɛma hom dza hom hia nyina
column3: dɛ mbrɛ n’ahonya wɔ enyimnyam mu tse

column2: "Afei hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn na enyimnyam nka no mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."
"Hom nkyia ahotseweefo no nyina nkorkor wɔ Kraest Jesus mu."
"Ahotseweefo no nyina kyiakyia hom
column3: nkanka hɔn a wofi Kaesar fie no."

column2: "Hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest adom nka hom sunsum."
